title: In game Lag (Server Side) / Stats not loading.
body:
My team mates have had 2 games in a row of Disconnects and in game lag. Nothing causing it on my side personally.

Also post game stats are not loading, {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

This issue should've resolved itself by now, these are known as ghost games and can occur when your client/the server doesn't get told a game has ended correctly.

These usually resolve themselves within 30 minutes-a few hours.
P.S. I am now also stuck on reconnect screen.
